item.title: Do you know all street names in your area like the back of your hand ? Test your knowledge with the aptly-named game ‚ÄúBack of your Hand‚Äù: https://backofyourhand.com. It‚Äôs powered by #OpenStreetMap data, so you can use it as a quality-assurance tool.

Mapping public transport features in #OpenStreetMap is admittedly a complex subject. Here is #OsmAnd‚Äôs ‚ÄúGuidelines on how to build or correct public transport routes‚Äù: https://osmand.net/blog/guideline-pt
This OpenStreetMap US Virtual Mappy Hour features an overview of #Overpass Turbo and accessing #OpenStreetMap data: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UvtvHl4Btsk

#GitHub will no longer present a cookie notification banner, because it's scrapping non-essential cookies: https://go.theregister.com/feed/www.theregister.com/2020/12/17/github_will_no_longer_present/ #cookies #privacy
The last issue of the #OpenStreetMap Mapper of the Month #MotM of this calendar year is available and features @vucod: https://openstreetmap.be/en/motm/2020/12/15/vucod.html.
Another month, another Mapper of the Month. Let's meet Diseret this time: https://openstreetmap.be/en/motm/2020/11/15/diseret.html #OpenStreetMap #Belgium #MotM
#OpenStreetCam becomes #KartaView, following the OSM Foundation‚Äôs discouraging of names like OpenStreetSomething: https://blog.improveosm.org/en/2020/11/hello-kartaview/ #OpenStreetMap
A 12-minute video tutorial to install #Wireguard and #NextCloud on a #Raspberry Pi with #Docker and #IOTstack: https://invidious.site/watch?v=7Pe-Cv0tnLs

Nice idea. #Plogging is a combination of jogging with picking up litter (Swedish verb plocka upp (pick up) + jogga (jog)). And there is even an app for that. #WePlog https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nebulae.weplog&hl=en&gl=US Powered by #OpenStreetMap as base map. It‚Äôs not without reminding #OpenLitterMap https://openlittermap.com, but this one is more about observation, whereas plogging is really taking action.
OSM In Realtime is a visualization of the changes made to #OpenStreetMap in near real-time. Great way to realize how lively the OSM community is. https://jwestman.gitlab.io/osm-in-realtime/

OSM Apps is a searchable web catalog of all apps and services identified in the #OpenStreetMap wiki: https://osm-apps.zottelig.ch. I knew there were many, but I never thought that many... üòÄ #OSMApps

How would you do this? Idea is to let participants (maybe 200 people) see a map of the world with where everyone is. For example, people would push a pin on a map or type a place name, and it would make the map of where everyone is. #map #OpenStreetMap

The second annual 30-day map challenge is starting November 1: https://www.gislounge.com/november-map-challenge/. Each day presents a new map challenge and cartographers are invited to create a map each day with the tools of their choice centered around that day‚Äôs theme and share it on social media using the #30DayMapChallenge hashtag. #OpenStreetMap

An extensive #tutorial on how to draw buildings quickly in #JOSM: https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/IpswichMapper/diary/394485. Maybe too quickly, if you judge by the comments to the post. Anyway, the article is full of #tips and techniques to better use JOSM. #openStreetMap

‚ÄúOpenStreetMap find‚Äù is a simple command line #CLI tool to explore #OpenStreetMap data: github.com/codesoap/osmf (MIT License). The tool short name ‚Äúosmf‚Äù can unfortunately be confused with ‚ÄúOpenStreetMap Foundation‚Äù, but that‚Äôs a minor issue probably.

Would there be ways to convince La Ligue Cardiologique Belge / De Belgische Cardiologische Liga to release their #AED data and use #OpenStreetMap as base map in their app ? https://www.liguecardioliga.be/reanim/
#OpenStreetMap #Belgium‚Äôs Mapper of the Month #MotM is Thierry Hancart in the spotlight: https://openstreetmap.be/en/motm/2020/10/15/thierry-hancart.html
I never thought I‚Äôd count üíØüíØ 200 hundred followers when I joined Mastodon two years ago... Thanks for your interest! Fediverse is a great place.

#BuDongSan is a #OpenStreetMap-based realtor tycoon game (BuDongSan is the Korean word for real estate). Notice it‚Äôs still in prototype phase. - https://mrvdh.github.com/budongsan - https://github.com/MRVDH/budongsan #FOSS #realestate #game
#OpenStreetMap Salt Lake City has a series of #Meetup events coming with @mvexel: https://www.meetup.com/OpenStreetMap-Utah/. Being online events, you can join from anywhere.
